snippet: Sunglasses and a straightforward coat say "low key" loud and clear.
abstract: Sunglasses and a straightforward coat say "low key" loud and clear.
lead_paragraph: Sunglasses and a straightforward coat say "low key" loud and clear. Here, the actress Reese Witherspoon wears a black sloucher with suede boots and a chevron print scarf; the BBC Radio 1 D.J. Fearne Cotton pairs a blazer coat with a buttoned-up collar and a neo-cameo brooch; and the actress Michelle Williams wears an effortless mix of polka dots and wool.
